verbose_text: Given proteomic profiling induced by PLpro, we hypothesized the activation of the ubiquitin-proteasomal system, p38 MAPK and ERK1/2 signaled as linked with PLpro induced upregulation of TGF-beta1 and vimentin.
evidence: p38 MAPK and ERK1/2 signaled as linked with PLpro-induced upregulation of TGF-beta1 and vimentin
